title: Minnesota shooting suspect and wife were ‘preppers,’ FBI affidavit says - The Washington Post
summary: Vance Boelter, charged with the fatal shooting of a Minnesota lawmaker and her husband, allegedly instructed his wife to prepare for the aftermath, indicating they were 'preppers,' according to an FBI affidavit.
timeline: 2025-06-21: Minnesota state lawmaker and her husband are fatally shot in their home.
2025-06-21: Vance Boelter is charged with the shooting.
2025-06-21: Boelter allegedly texts his wife instructions to prepare for the aftermath.
why_matters: The incident highlights the dangers posed by individuals who may be influenced by extremist ideologies and the potential for violence in domestic settings.
